info.title: Simpplr APIs
info.description:
This collection of Simpplr APIs lets developers create and manage content outside the Simpplr UI. We have APIs for notifications, alerts, app searches, and content creation. Looking for parameters or code samples? Click on an endpoint to see a sample snippet along with descriptions of its parameters and responses.

If you have questions about an API, reach out to us support@simpplr.com
